name: Jewel Match Warriors
description: Jewel Match Warriorsis a bejeweled game with fun and exciting RPG jewel elements. Fight against all kinds of monsters, such as jewel skeletons, jewel mages, jewel goblins, and finally even a jewel dragon protecting his jewels and other treasures. After every battle you will get a chance to collect new equipment in the shop and play for ghouls and jewels.
